issue.subject: Unable to update from 4.1.0 to 4.2.0 Beta-1
issue.description:
Unable to update from 4.1.0 to 4.2.0 Beta-1 Message at installation: 
Cannot add or update a child row: a foreign key constraint fails (`dev`., CONSTRAINT `jos_sdi_order_fk4` FOREIGN KEY (`thirdparty_id`) REFERENCES `jos_sdi_organism` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACT) 

SQL=ALTER TABLE `jos_sdi_order` ADD CONSTRAINT `jos_sdi_order_fk4` FOREIGN KEY (`thirdparty_id`) REFERENCES `jos_sdi_organism` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION;

journals.notes:
My bad:
Error comes from my migrated data (In v2, an order without third party was set with an id of "0", now it's set to null).
This issue can be rejected, sorry about that.
